tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (NP (DT The) (NN seed)) (PP (IN of) (S (VP (VBG suffering) (PP (IN in) (NP (PRP you))))))) (VP (VP (MD may) (VP (VB be) (ADJP (JJ strong)))) (, ,) (CC but) (VP (VBP do) (RB n't) (VP (VB wait) (SBAR (IN until) (S (NP (PRP you)) (VP (VBP have) (NP (DT no) (JJR more) (NN suffering)) (PP (IN before) (S (VP (VBG allowing) (NP (NN happiness))))))))))) (. .)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [strong/JJ nsubj>[seed/NN det>The/DT acl>[suffering/VBG mark>of/IN nmod:in>[you/PRP case>in/IN]]] aux>may/MD cop>be/VB punct>,/, cc>but/CC conj:but>[wait/VB nsubj>seed/NN aux>do/VBP neg>n't/RB advcl>[have/VBP mark>until/IN nsubj>you/PRP dobj>[suffering/NN neg>no/DT amod>more/JJR] advcl>[allowing/VBG mark>before/IN dobj>happiness/NN]]] punct>./.]
